trans-unit.source: Contains values of properties that a component might need only occasionally.
trans-unit.target: Contém valores de propriedades de que um componente pode precisar apenas ocasionalmente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag> class enables a class to appear to have properties it really does not have.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag> classe permite que uma classe possui propriedades realmente não tem.

trans-unit.source: The class can then use the properties when needed, and save on memory when the class does not use the properties.
trans-unit.target: A classe pode usar as propriedades quando necessário e salvar na memória quando a classe não usa as propriedades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag> is used internally to the .NET Framework, and its constructors are private.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag> é usada internamente para o .NET Framework, e seus construtores são privadas.

trans-unit.source: You cannot create an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag>.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível criar uma instância do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag>.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for the component.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor da tela de fundo para o componente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the background color of the component.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> que representa a cor de plano de fundo do componente.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag" /> to be copied.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag" /> a ser copiado.

trans-unit.source: Copies an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag" />.
trans-unit.target: Copia um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag" />.

trans-unit.source: A new copy of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova cópia do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the component.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a fonte do texto exibido pelo componente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> to apply to the text displayed by the component.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> para aplicar o texto exibido pelo componente.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the component.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cor de primeiro plano do componente.

trans-unit.source: The foreground color of the component.
trans-unit.target: A cor de primeiro plano do componente.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Color.Empty" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag" /> contains all default values.
trans-unit.target: Retorna se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag" /> contém todos os valores padrão.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag" /> contains all default values; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.OwnerDrawPropertyBag" /> contiver todos os valores padrão; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> a ser preenchido com dados.

trans-unit.source: The destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: O destino dessa serialização.

trans-unit.source: Populates the specified <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> with the data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: Preenche o <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> especificado com os dados necessários para serializar o objeto de destino.

trans-unit.source: for providing serialization services.
trans-unit.target: para fornecer serviços de serialização.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SerializationFormatter" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SerializationFormatter" />.
